name: Read Later
description: Schedule a notification from the shared URL.

name: Download Video
description: Downloads a video with youtube_dl. youtube_dl must be installed from PyPi.

name: Run Python Code
description: Run the shared or copied Python code.

name: Send Notification
description: Sends a notification to a device with Pyto and a token.

name: Download Images
description: Downloads all images in tags from a web page.

name: Manipulate String
description: Opens the Python REPL with the shared string.
